goal.en: "學習以下內容 ‧Introduction / Global observing system ‧Matrix algebra / basic statistal concepts ‧Estimation theories: Maximum likelihood and BLUE ‧Data assimilation: the Kalman Filter ‧Statistics associated with background, observation and model errors ‧Optimal interpolation and 3D-Var ‧Advanced DA scheme (I) 4D-Var ‧Advanced DA scheme (II) Ensemble-based Kalman Filters ‧Hybrid DA ‧DA in geophysical sciences, from small-scale to large-scale and from single-component system to dynamically coupled system ‧Methods to deal with model errors ‧Applications/Tools developed with DA"

content.en:
"‧Introduction / Global observing system
‧Matrix algebra / basic statistal concepts
‧Estimation theories: Maximum likelihood and BLUE
‧Data assimilation: the Kalman Filter
‧Statistics associated with background, observation and model errors
‧Optimal interpolation and 3D-Var
‧Mid-term/ Students present the outline of their chosen projects
‧Advanced DA scheme (I) 4D-Var
‧Advanced DA scheme (II) Ensemble-based Kalman Filters
‧Hybrid DA
‧DA in geophysical sciences, from small-scale to large-scale and from single-component system to dynamically coupled system
‧Methods to deal with model errors
‧Applications/Tools developed with DA
‧Final Week: presentation of projects
‧Final exam"

grading.en: "homework (30%) Project (40%): students will be given a simple toy model (the Lorenz 3-variable model) and will be asked to implement a DA scheme in the system. Students will need to design their own scientific question with their system. Exams:final exam (30%)"
